Product Description

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame IP Rating: IP44 waterproof Boxes Spacing: 10 in Lead Length: 118 in Bulb QTY: 60 count Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A Output: 4.5V,1A Power: AC/DC

Attractive Design – The lighted gift boxes are designed with Christmas elements like snowflakes pattern, pine cones, pine needles, red berries and classic Christmas colors, red, green and blue. The bows are detachable, you can attach them to different boxes as you like
3 Sizes Light Up Christmas Presents – 10″x10″x10″ large red box with 25 led bulbs, 8″x8″x8″ medium green box with 20 led bulbs, 6″x6″x6″ small blue box with 15 led bulbs. The lights are warm white, creating a cozy Christmas atmosphere
Easy to Install and Disassemble – Just insert support rods into the boxes, and put them anywhere indoors. Use the stakes to fix them to the ground if used outdoor. The pop up Christmas gift boxes decorations are retractable for easy storage
Durable Material – Sturdy metal frame supports the Christmas light up decorations. The Scallion cloth covered on the outside is waterproof and not easy to fade. The bulbs are buckled for a beautiful light effect, match your Christmas tree decorations well
Indoor and Outdoor Use – Christmas lighted gift boxes are IP44 waterproof, are perfect outdoor lighted holiday displays for your walkway, yard, porch, or indoor Christmas decorations for locations like living room. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications

  • Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame
  • IP Rating: IP44 waterproof
  • Boxes Spacing: 10 in
  • Lead Length: 118 in
  • Bulb QTY: 60 count
  • Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A
  • Output: 4.5V,1A
  • Power: AC/DC

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Steps for Small Dogs and Cats, Portable Ramp Stairs for Couch, Sofa, and High Bed Climbing, Non-Slip Balanced Indoor Step Support, Paw Safe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.99 - $75.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:35:49 UTC – Details)


Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the couch to give you a snuggle. But if your pet is too small or getting older they can’t always jump up and down to do it themselves. And if you’re not always around to help them or you’re getting a bit old yourself, sometimes you need a little extra help. We developed the Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs as a simple, effective way to get them up and down while putting less stress on you both. Featuring a non-slip bottom these fabric-covered stairs in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step sizes simply push right up to the edge so they can climb up or get down quickly, easily, and safely. Product Details: Pet Stairs for Couch, Bed, and Sofa; Supports Small to Medium Dogs and Cats; Heavy-Duty CertiPUR-US Certified Foam; Well-Balanced, Reliable Support for Pets; Lightweight and Portable for Whole Home Use; Soft Fabric Exterior for Paw-Friendly Support; Available in Multiple Colors to Match Home Decor; Help your small dog or aging cat get up on the couch or bed more easily with a soft, supportive foam pet stair system from Best Pet Supplies designed specifically for your four-legged friends. Get one now by clicking Add to Cart above.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 30 x 16 x 22.5 inches; 5.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ST235C-L
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08L42MKC3
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam: To ensure that your pet gets the safest quality steps, we made sure that our USA sourced foams are CertiPUR-US Certified. CertiPUR-US Certified foams are manufactured without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.
Reduces Strain on Older Adults – Our versatile dog steps not only help your pets they minimize the need for you to have to pick up your animal to get them up on the furniture, which is especially important if you struggle with strength or stability
Multiple Step Size Options – Ideal for small to medium sized pets these steps for dogs and cats come in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step options, so you can use them as dog stairs for beds or pet stairs for cats who need help climbing on a sofa
Trendy Home Decor Colors – We want our dog stairs for high beds and couches to better match your living room, bedroom, or personal space which is why they’re available in 17 different colors and patterns to fit your individual style

Read more

Stability For All Ages

With an anti-slip bottom and 15 or 16 inch width, your dog or cat will climb effortlessly to their favorite spots.

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam*

Crafted from CertiPUR-US certified foams, these pet stairs are made without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.

Certificate Issued: September 25, 2018 Alliance for Flexible Polyurethane Foam/CertiPUR-US program.

Cushion Every Step

The mattress-grade foam inside cushions and supports your pet’s every step reducing stress and relieving pressure on their paws and joints.

Easy to Keep Clean

All sizes of steps come with a completely removable cover that is machine washable. All our fabrics are pleasing to the touch and the eyes. With different options to choose from, it will be easy to maintain your household’s good vibes.

Read more

Sizes Available:

– Small: 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L.

– Medium: 15″W x 18″H x 24″L.

– Large: 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L.

Different Heights For Different Spaces

Does your dog need just a little help getting on the couch? Is your cat finding it difficult to reach his favorite window? Give them ultimate access with our 3 ranges of height.

The large is 22 1/2″ inches in height, giving your pet access to taller places within your home. The medium reaches 18″ in height, allowing for a simple climb to reach a snuggle session. The small steps are 13 1/2″ tall, for a simple boost up to a favorite window sill.

  • Our steps are easy to move around your home or take on the go for some adventures. Never worry about your pet’s accessibility anymore, with Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs!

Read more

Brown Linen
Grey Corduroy
Grey Linen
Dark Brown Suede

Bamworld brings modern designs to transform your home that will surely space saving need for your home. In addition, we offers a variety of furniture for different families. 【7 Pots Plant Stand】Unique design capable of holding 7 pot plants. The plant stand can be used as a decorative piece to organize your selection of plants. The stand is suitable for use indoors and outdoors.
【Durable And Sturdy】Wider width (12 inch) and clever use of the triangle stability principle makes the wood plant holder more stable.Also, plastic joints consolidate this plant stand.All of these give you more durable structure.
【Natural Wood With Carbonization】This plant rack is made of natural wood which underwent 1000 °F high temperature carbonization. Because of the carbonization process, no varnish or paint is required thus it is more safe for use and environmentally friendly

Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

【Waterproof Design & Weather Resistance】The snowflake projector light outdoor features waterproof performance, the light is IP65 waterproof rating and the power adapter is IP44 waterproof rating, which suits for outdoors no matter what weather it is raining or snowing; it can operate normally between -25°C- 32°C, so don’t worry about the hot summer and cold winter; please don’t let it directly soak in a rainstorm
【Easy to set up & Adjustable】 It just takes you a minute or two to install it; our Christmas snowflake projector light comes with a round base and a ground stake, you can put the base on a desk indoors, or you can plug the stake into the ground in your garden, yard, you also can install it on the wall with screws; Equipped with a 360°shaft rotary joint, it is ever so convenient and flexible to adjust the projection place where you want, without dismantling, you can turn it anywhere you want

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $99.95 - $83.04
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:53 UTC – Details)


Why wait for the perfect weather to have a great gardening day? Meet the AeroGarden Sprout, a hydroponic garden that grows up to 3 of your favorite herbs, veggies, or flowers year-round – no sun, soil, or green thumb required. The indoor garden’s grow light hood contains 10W of white, red, and blue LED lights, giving your plants the full spectrum of light they need to grow quickly – up to 5x faster than in soil. The Sprout is compact and adjusts for up to 10″ of grow height. The automated timer makes sure the lights go on and off at exactly the right time, and the soft-touch button on the grow light hood lets you manually control light and reset plant food reminders. The AeroGarden Sprout looks great anywhere – kitchen, office, you name it. Not to mention, the Gourmet Herbs Seed Pod Kit, featuring Genovese Basil, Curly Parsley, and Dill, lets you keep the fresh flavors of summer all year long.
BRAND NEW DESIGN – Experience better plant growth from your AeroGarden Sprout indoor garden with a sleek modern look, new silent pump, and simple soft-touch button to control lights and reset plant food reminders
PLANT TO PLATE – up to 3 plants can be grown at a time, up to 10″ tall. Plants grow in water, not soil – an advanced indoor garden made simple
HIGH EFFICIENCY LED LIGHTS – Our energy efficient full spectrum 10-watt LED grow lights tune to the specific needs of plants to maximize photosynthesis, resulting in rapid, natural growth and abundant harvests
INCLUDES GOURMET HERB SEED KIT (3 POD) – Genovese Basil, Curly Parsley, and Dill & a 3oz bottle of our patented, all natural plant nutrients (enough for a full season of growth)
ALWAYS HOMEGROWN: FRESH. EASY. SAFE. – AeroGarden has been providing fresh, safe food options for over fifteen years and is the market leader for indoor hydroponic growing systems

About AeroGarden

Our Mission: To bring the magic of gardening in-home all year-round, and to inspire and enable people to enhance their food, their homes, and their lives through a simple and daily connection to what they grow.

AeroGarden Sprout—Grow anywhere with style and convenience. The 3-Pod Sprout garden is our smallest countertop garden with 10 inches of grow height and a sleek, slim design that fits easily in the kitchen or any room in your house. With the AeroGarden Sprout, it’s easy to grow fresh, natural food right on your countertop, guaranteed.

• Grow Fresh Herbs & Vegetables Year-Round

• Plants Grow Naturally in Water: No Soil, No Mess

• Energy Efficient LED Grow Lights for Faster Growth

• Simple Reminders Take the Guesswork Out of Growing

• Sprouts in Days, Harvest in Weeks, Enjoy for Months

Read more

Read more

Brand New Design

The new Sprout has a sleek, modern look, thin grow light hood, improved grow deck design, and new pump for water circulation that’s practically silent and provides even better plant growth.

Ultra-thin Grow Light Hood

Plants grow bigger and generate bountiful harvests because of our full spectrum LED grow lights. Our lighting systems are developed for maximum energy efficiency and cost just pennies a day to operate.

Grows Naturally in Water, 5X Faster Than Soil

Save yourself the hassle and mess of growing indoors with soil. You’ll use less water and your plants will grow faster, getting everything they need from the water and plant food in your AeroGarden.

Super Simple Controls

The new Sprout is a complete indoor gardening system with a simplified one-touch control on the light hood. This allows you to turn Grow Lights on and off, as well as to start a new garden cycle.

Are you ready for the next generation of awesome? Introducing Wyze Cam Pan v2, now with Color Night Vision! Say goodbye to losing sight when something moves outside the view of your camera. With its 110°/sec rotation speed, 360° horizontal range, and 93° vertical range, Wyze Cam Pan v2 delivers 360° coverage in under 3 seconds so you can see exactly what you want to see, when you want to see it. This camera is a favorite for busy households and pet owners.
Pan, tilt, and zoom: Control remotely using the Wyze app so you can see the whole room, fast. Or monitor a room automatically by setting 4 predefined waypoints. Panning has a 360° left/right rotation range and tilting has a 93° vertical up/down range.Controller Type:Google Assistant.Connectivity protocol:Wi-Fi.
Now with Color Night Vision: Record night time video in full, vivid color in environments up to 25x darker than traditional cameras.
Livestream from anywhere in full 1080p HD: See inside your home in real time using your mobile device.
Two-way audio: Speak with anyone you care about through the Wyze app.
Motion & Sound detection: Records video when motion & sound are detected and sends an alert to your phone.

360˚ of Coverage

See the entire room. Fast.

Smart Assistant Compatible

Use your voice to see what’s happening around your home.

Motion Tracking

Automatically detect, tag, and track motion in real-time.

Instant Security Alerts

Get notified whenever motion is detected. Customize notifications in the Wyze app.

Two-Way Audio

Listen and talk to anyone you care about while not at home.

Color Night Vision

Capture every story in color, even at night.

function getLoadingGifDiv() {
return ‘‘;

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Product Description

[ 5 Pack Christmas Lighted Gift Boxes ] 5 Pack lighted Christmas gift boxes with different size include super large: 10*10*12inch, large: 8*8*10inch, medium: 6*6*8inch, small: 5*5*7inch, mini: 4*4*6inch. Each gift box is matched with green, red, gold, silver and blue bows, designed with snowflake patterns, pine cones, red berries and pine needles.Copyright Certificated Model.
[ 80 LED Warm White Lights ] The 80 LED warm white lights inside can passes through the gift box, and reflected on the surface of the gift box, bringing you impressive glowing display effect.
[ Adapter Included ] Just plug and unplug it for power on and off. With 10 feet long lead wire, easy and convenient for outdoor use. The 4.5V-0.8A low voltage is not easy to heat, and it can be used safely.
[ Durable Materials & Compact Storage ] Constructed by sturdy metal frame and covered with yarn material, durable and reusable. They can be stacked one-by-one for compact storage, easy carrying and space saving.
[ Lighted Christmas Present Box Decor ] Suitable for outdoor and indoor Christmas decorations home, Christmas tree, fireplace, room, window, porch, front door, patio, small tree, bedroom, snow, yard, etc.





Read more

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Crinkle Dog Toy for Small, Medium, and Large Breeds, Cute No Stuffing Duck with Soft Squeaker, Fun for Indoor Puppies and Senior Pups, Plush No Mess Chew and Play
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)


Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand up to all the biting, chewing, and tugging. That’s why we created these super cute, high-quality Best Pet Supplies Duck-Shaped Dog Toys with built-in squeaker and crinkle paper. These versatile toys for dogs give them multiple ways to play and stay engaged while satisfying their natural behavioral needs. And because there’s no stuffing you don’t have to worry about cleaning up a big mess the moment your dog rips into them. Product Details: Soft Duck Dog Toy Built-In Squeezable Squeaker Crinkle Paper Interior No Stuffing or Fluff Available in 6 Fun Colors Overall Length: 15”
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.5 x 7.5 x 1.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PT332
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, LLC
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09BBM5CX8
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Cute and Colorful Duck Shape – Shaped like a real duck these dog crinkle toys for small dogs, medium dogs, and every size in between comes in 6 unique colors and provides a more puppy friendly shape that’s easy to carry around
No Fluff, No Mess Design – Unlike messy bones, ropes, or other toys for aggressive chewers these dog crinkle toys won’t leave behind a mess after they’re done playing. They also boast reinforced fabric and stitching to help them hold up to chewing
Active Play, Tossing, and Retrieving – Our cute duck chew toys for dogs can be used for bonding with your puppy, reducing stress or separation anxiety, or simply giving them an active outlet for channeling aggression or intense play


Read more





Cleaning Made Easy

Need to get that toy cleaned from drools or dirt? Just toss it into the washing machine on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low heat.

Soft, Plush, and Durable

We use higher-quality materials in our dog toys to ensure they hold up to regular chewing, biting, tugging, and pulling. If the squeaker or the paper comes out simply discard them and you can continue to let your dog play with the duck for as long as it’s still chewable.

Audible Play Sounds

The crinkle paper in the body and the squeaker in the head give dogs multiple outlets for stimulating their auditory and physical senses. These distinct sounds will keep them having fun far longer than standard toys, so they can relieve stress, stay focused, and even reduce aggressive behaviors.

Adorable Variety

At 15” in size these colorful ducks are more fun for young puppies and older dogs alike because they feature multiple “chew points” and they’re a better shape for carrying.

Read more



4.5
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)
